title: BUG With PRESTIGE JACKPOT BAGS
body:
oK 

This official post from riot says 

"Arcade 2019 Jackpot Bag - 50 PP
Contains 3 legacy skin shards (one guaranteed 975 RP or higher) and 1520 Orange Essencesame as the project 2019 jackpot bag"

https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/end-year-prestige-shop-open

3 skins AND 1520 orange ess

in game it says 

contains ONE of the following 3 skins or 1520!

Nice to see riot screwing people over
